title: WE WANT URF NOW
body: dear rito pls give urf to us many of my freinds that play league only comes once a year to paly and that is on urf mode and urf mode is the best thing that happend in theleague comunity and if you are taking it away then that is just plain cruel like we need urf and if you mak it 2 days 2 tiems it is still cruel we need it like old fashion when it is 2 weeks long that is the awsome ness we need in april pls think about it pls and i spent lots of money liek 100 jsut to buy skins and champions for urf skins so i see bunch of rainbows on hec and snow balls on syndra pls jsut give us urf back PLS

replies.body: will you shut the fuck up its coming soon
It is coming, just not this weekend.
